### Question  
What is the projected change in solar panel energy output during summer months in Seville, Spain, due to higher average temperatures between 2030 and 2040? 

### Short answer (1-line)  
Projected energy output of solar panels in Seville may decrease due to higher temperatures, affecting efficiency.

However, advancements in solar technology and improved cooling methods may mitigate some of the negative impacts. Monitoring temperature and solar radiation patterns will be essential to adapt strategies for optimal energy production during this period.
